[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ToolboxCategory](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.md)

## ToolboxCategory class

Class for a category in a toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ToolboxCategory extends ToolboxItem implements ISelectableToolboxItem 
```
**Extends:** [ToolboxItem](./blockly.toolboxitem_class.md)

**Implements:** [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md)

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [borderWidth](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.borderwidth_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The width in pixels of the strip of colour next to each category. |
|  [colour\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.colour__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | string | The colour of the category. |
|  [cssConfig\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.cssconfig__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | CssConfig |  |
|  [defaultBackgroundColour](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.defaultbackgroundcolour_property.md) | <code>static</code> | string | The default colour of the category. This is used as the background colour of the category when it is selected. |
|  [flyoutItems\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.flyoutitems__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | string \| [FlyoutItemInfoArray](./blockly.utils_namespace.toolbox_namespace.flyoutiteminfoarray_typealias.md) | The flyout items for this category. |
|  [htmlDiv\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.htmldiv__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | HTMLDivElement \| null | The HTML container for the category. |
|  [iconDom\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.icondom__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | Element \| null | The HTML element for the toolbox icon. |
|  [isDisabled\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.isdisabled__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | True if this category is disabled, false otherwise. |
|  [isHidden\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.ishidden__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | True if the category is meant to be hidden, false otherwise. |
|  [labelDom\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.labeldom__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | Element \| null | The HTML element for the toolbox label. |
|  [name\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.name__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | string | The name that will be displayed on the category. |
|  [nestedPadding](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.nestedpadding_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The number of pixels to move the category over at each nested level. |
|  [registrationName](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.registrationname_property.md) | <code>static</code> | string | Name used for registering a toolbox category. |
|  [rowContents\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.rowcontents__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | HTMLDivElement \| null | The HTML element that holds children elements of the category row. |
|  [rowDiv\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.rowdiv__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | HTMLDivElement \| null | The HTML element for the category row. |
|  [toolboxItemDef\_](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.toolboxitemdef__property.md) |  | [CategoryInfo](./blockly.utils_namespace.toolbox_namespace.categoryinfo_typealias.md) |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addColourBorder\_(colour)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.addcolourborder__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Add the strip of colour to the toolbox category. |
|  [allAncestorsExpanded\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.allancestorsexpanded__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Whether all ancestors of a category (parent and parent's parent, etc.) are expanded. |
|  [closeIcon\_(iconDiv)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.closeicon__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Adds appropriate classes to display a closed icon. |
|  [createContainer\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.createcontainer__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the container that holds the row and any subcategories. |
|  [createDom\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.createdom__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the DOM for the category. |
|  [createIconDom\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.createicondom__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the span that holds the category icon. |
|  [createLabelDom\_(name)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.createlabeldom__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the span that holds the category label. This should have an ID for accessibility purposes. |
|  [createRowContainer\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.createrowcontainer__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the parent of the contents container. All clicks will happen on this div. |
|  [createRowContentsContainer\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.createrowcontentscontainer__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates the container for the label and icon. This is necessary so we can set all subcategory pointer events to none. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.dispose_1_method.md) |  |  |
|  [getClickTarget()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.getclicktarget_1_method.md) |  | Gets the HTML element that is clickable. The parent toolbox element receives clicks. The parent toolbox will add an ID to this element so it can pass the onClick event to the correct toolboxItem. |
|  [getColour\_(categoryDef)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.getcolour__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Gets either the colour or the style for a category. |
|  [getContents()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.getcontents_1_method.md) |  | Gets the contents of the category. These are items that are meant to be displayed in the flyout. |
|  [getDiv()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.getdiv_1_method.md) |  |  |
|  [getName()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.getname_1_method.md) |  | Gets the name of the category. Used for emitting events. |
|  [getParent()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.getparent_1_method.md) |  |  |
|  [hide()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.hide_1_method.md) |  | Hide the category. |
|  [init()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.init_1_method.md) |  | Initializes the toolbox item. This includes creating the DOM and updating the state of any items based on the info object. Init should be called immediately after the construction of the toolbox item, to ensure that the category contents are properly parsed. |
|  [isSelectable()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.isselectable_1_method.md) |  |  |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.isvisible_1_method.md) |  | Whether the category is visible. A category is only visible if all of its ancestors are expanded and isHidden\_ is false. |
|  [makeDefaultCssConfig\_()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.makedefaultcssconfig__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Creates an object holding the default classes for a category. |
|  [onClick(\_e)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.onclick_1_method.md) |  | Handles when the toolbox item is clicked. |
|  [openIcon\_(iconDiv)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.openicon__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Adds appropriate classes to display an open icon. |
|  [parseCategoryDef\_(categoryDef)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.parsecategorydef__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Parses the non-contents parts of the category def. |
|  [parseContents\_(categoryDef)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.parsecontents__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Parses the contents array depending on if the category is a dynamic category, or if its contents are meant to be shown in the flyout. |
|  [refreshTheme()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.refreshtheme_1_method.md) |  | Updates the colour for this category. |
|  [setDisabled(isDisabled)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.setdisabled_1_method.md) |  | Sets whether the category is disabled. |
|  [setSelected(isSelected)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.setselected_1_method.md) |  | Sets the current category as selected. |
|  [setVisible\_(isVisible)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.setvisible__1_method.md) |  | Sets whether the category is visible or not. For a category to be visible its parent category must also be expanded. |
|  [show()](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.show_1_method.md) |  | Show the category. Category will only appear if its parent category is also expanded. |
|  [updateFlyoutContents(contents)](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.updateflyoutcontents_1_method.md) |  | Updates the contents to be displayed in the flyout. If the flyout is open when the contents are updated, refreshSelection on the toolbox must also be called. |
